trans-unit.source: The sprite or sprites to draw. Sprites will be scaled to the size of this item.
trans-unit.target: 要绘制的精灵。绘制的精灵将被缩放到此项目的大小。

trans-unit.source: The sprite or sprites used to draw this particle.
trans-unit.target: 用于绘制该粒子的精灵。

trans-unit.source: The stack becomes enabled and appropriate signals are emitted when endMacro() is called for the outermost macro.
trans-unit.target: 当为最外面的宏调用endMacro（）时，将启用堆栈并发出适当的信号。

trans-unit.source: The stack can be set explicitly with setStack(). Alternatively, a QUndoGroup object can be set with setGroup(). The view will then update itself automatically whenever the active stack of the group changes.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用setStack（）显式设置堆栈。或者，可以使用setGroup（）设置QUndoGroup对象。每当组的活动堆栈发生更改时，视图将自动更新。

trans-unit.source: The stack now contains a single item: [A].
trans-unit.target: 堆栈现在包含一个项目： [A] 。

trans-unit.source: The stack now contains the following items: [A, B, C].
trans-unit.target: 堆栈现在包含以下项目： [A, B, C] 。

trans-unit.source: The stack now contains the following items: [A, B, D].
trans-unit.target: 堆栈现在包含以下项目： [A, B, D] 。

trans-unit.source: The stack now contains the following items: [A, B].
trans-unit.target: 现在，堆栈中包含以下项目： [A, B] 。

trans-unit.source: The stacking order of two sibling items also counts for each item's children and descendant items. So if one item is on top of another, then all its children will also be on top of all the other item's children as well.
trans-unit.target: 两个兄弟项目的堆叠顺序也会对每个项目的子项目和子项目进行计算。因此,如果一个项目位于另一个项目之上,那么它的所有子项目也将位于另一个项目的所有子项目之上。

trans-unit.source: The standard
trans-unit.target: 标准

trans-unit.source: The standard ForwardRenderer includes a DebugOverlay node that can be enabled via the ForwardRenderer::showDebugOverlay property.
trans-unit.target: 标准的ForwardRenderer包含一个DebugOverlay节点，可以通过ForwardRenderer :: showDebugOverlay属性启用该节点。

trans-unit.source: The standard QStyledItemDelegate class informs the view when it has finished editing by emitting the closeEditor() signal. The view ensures that the editor widget is closed and destroyed. In this example, we only provide simple editing facilities, so we need never emit this signal.
trans-unit.target: 标准QStyledItemDelegate类通过发出closeEditor（）信号在完成编辑后通知视图。该视图确保编辑器小部件已关闭并销毁。在此示例中，我们仅提供简单的编辑工具，因此我们无需发出此信号。

trans-unit.source: The standard C++ object model provides very efficient runtime support for the object paradigm. But its static nature is inflexibile in certain problem domains. Graphical user interface programming is a domain that requires both runtime efficiency and a high level of flexibility. Qt provides this, by combining the speed of C++ with the flexibility of the Qt Object Model.
trans-unit.target: 标准的C++对象模型为对象范式提供了非常高效的运行时支持。但是它的静态性质在某些问题域中是不灵活的。图形用户界面编程是一个既需要运行时效率又需要高度灵活性的领域。Qt提供了这一点,它将C++的速度和Qt对象模型的灵活性结合起来。

trans-unit.source: The standard ECMAScript built-ins are not explicitly documented in the QML documentation. For more information on their use, please refer to the ECMA-262 7th edition standard or one of the many online JavaScript reference and tutorial sites, such as the W3Schools JavaScript Reference (JavaScript Objects Reference section). Many sites focus on JavaScript in the browser, so in some cases you may need to double check the specification to determine whether a given function or object is part of standard ECMAScript or specific to the browser environment. In the case of the W3Schools link above, the JavaScript Objects Reference section generally covers the standard, while the Browser Objects Reference and HTML DOM Objects Reference sections are browser specific (and thus not applicable to QML).
trans-unit.target: QML文档中未明确记录标准的ECMAScript内置插件。有关其用法的更多信息，请参考ECMA-262第7版标准或许多在线JavaScript参考和教程站点之一，例如W3Schools JavaScript参考（“ JavaScript对象参考”部分）。许多站点专注于浏览器中的JavaScript，因此在某些情况下，您可能需要仔细检查规范，以确定给定的函数或对象是标准ECMAScript的一部分还是特定于浏览器环境的。对于上面的W3Schools链接，“ JavaScript Objects Reference 部分通常涵盖标准，而“ Browser Objects Reference 和“ HTML DOM Objects Reference 部分是特定于浏览器的（因此不适用于QML）。

trans-unit.source: The standard ISO offset form of the time zone name, e.g. "UTC+01:00"
trans-unit.target: 时区名称的标准ISO偏移形式,例如 "UTC+01:00"

trans-unit.source: The standard QForwardRenderer includes a QDebugOverlay node that can be enabled via the QForwardRenderer::showDebugOverlay property.
trans-unit.target: 标准的QForwardRenderer包括一个QDebugOverlay节点,可以通过QForwardRenderer::showDebugOverlay属性启用。

trans-unit.source: The standard arrow cursor is the default for widgets in a normal state.
trans-unit.target: 标准的箭头光标是正常状态下小组件的默认值。

trans-unit.source: The standard arrow cursor.
trans-unit.target: 标准的箭头光标。

trans-unit.source: The standard error (stderr) of the running process.
trans-unit.target: 运行进程的标准误差(stderr)。

trans-unit.source: The standard factory implementation provides editors for a variety of data types. These are created whenever a delegate needs to provide an editor for data supplied by a model. The following table shows the relationship between types and the standard editors provided.
trans-unit.target: 标准工厂的实现为各种数据类型提供了编辑器。只要委托人需要为模型提供的数据提供编辑器,就会创建这些编辑器。下表显示了类型和提供的标准编辑器之间的关系。

trans-unit.source: The standard folder icon used to represent directories on local filesystems
trans-unit.target: 标准文件夹图标,用于表示本地文件系统中的目录。

trans-unit.source: The standard layout provided by Qt can handle simple word processing including inline images, lists and tables.
trans-unit.target: Qt提供的标准布局可以处理简单的文字处理,包括内联图片、列表和表格。

trans-unit.source: The standard library of types and functionality for the QML language, which is provided by the Qt Quick module, and may be accessed with "import QtQuick 2.3".
trans-unit.target: Qt Quick模块提供了QML语言的类型和功能的标准库，可以通过“ import QtQuick 2.3” 进行访问。

trans-unit.source: The standard library of types and functionality for the QML language, which is provided by the Qt Quick module, and may be accessed with "import QtQuick 2.3".
trans-unit.target: Qt Quick模块提供了QML语言的类型和功能的标准库，可通过“ import QtQuick 2.3”进行访问。

trans-unit.source: The standard library of types and functionality for the QML language, which is provided by the Qt Quick module, and may be accessed with "import QtQuick".
trans-unit.target: Qt Quick模块提供了QML语言的类型和功能的标准库，可通过“ import QtQuick ”进行访问。

trans-unit.source: The standard output (stdout) of the running process.
trans-unit.target: 正在运行的进程的标准输出(stdout)。

trans-unit.source: The standard time in a time zone, i.e. when Daylight-Saving is not in effect. For example when formatting a display name this will show something like "Pacific Standard Time".
trans-unit.target: 一个时区的标准时间,即当夏令时不生效时。例如,当格式化显示名称时,将显示类似 "Pacific Standard Time "的内容。

trans-unit.source: The standard view classes provide default selection models that can be used in most applications. A selection model belonging to one view can be obtained using the view's selectionModel() function, and shared between many views with setSelectionModel(), so the construction of new selection models is generally not required.
trans-unit.target: 标准视图类提供了可以在大多数应用程序中使用的默认选择模型。可以使用视图的selectionModel（）函数获得属于一个视图的选择模型，并通过setSelectionModel（）在许多视图之间共享该模型，因此通常不需要构造新的选择模型。

trans-unit.source: The standard views automatically support internal drag and drop, where items are moved around to change the order in which they are displayed. By default, drag and drop is not enabled for these views because they are configured for the simplest, most common uses. To allow items to be dragged around, certain properties of the view need to be enabled, and the items themselves must also allow dragging to occur.
trans-unit.target: 标准视图自动支持内部拖放,即移动项目以改变其显示顺序。默认情况下,这些视图不启用拖放功能,因为它们是为最简单、最常见的用途而配置的。要允许项目被拖动,需要启用视图的某些属性,并且项目本身也必须允许拖动。

trans-unit.source: The standard views provided with Qt use instances of QStyledItemDelegate to provide editing facilities. This default implementation of the delegate interface renders items in the usual style for each of the standard views: QListView, QTableView, and QTreeView.
trans-unit.target: Qt随附的标准视图使用QStyledItemDelegate的实例来提供编辑功能。委托接口的此默认实现为每个标准视图QListView，QTableView和QTreeView以常规样式呈现项目。

trans-unit.source: The standard way to query the API used by the scene graph is to use QSGRendererInterface::graphicsApi() once the scene graph has initialized, for example when or after the sceneGraphInitialized() signal is emitted. In that case one gets the true, real result, because then it is known that everything was initialized correctly using that graphics API.
trans-unit.target: 查询场景图使用的API的标准方法是在场景图初始化之后（例如，在发出sceneGraphInitialized（）信号时或之后）使用QSGRendererInterface :: graphicsApi（）。在那种情况下，将得到真实的结果，因为这样就可以知道使用该图形API正确初始化了所有内容。

trans-unit.source: The start angle is reported clockwise, with zero degrees at the 3 o'clock position.
trans-unit.target: 起始角度按顺时针方向报告,3点钟位置为零度。

trans-unit.source: The start of the timeline.
trans-unit.target: 时间线的开始。

trans-unit.source: The start position of the display text for a hypertext link has changed.
trans-unit.target: 超文本链接的显示文字的起始位置已经改变。

trans-unit.source: The startAngle and spanAngle must be specified in 1/16th of a degree, i.e. a full circle equals 5760 (16 * 360). Positive values for the angles mean counter-clockwise while negative values mean the clockwise direction. Zero degrees is at the 3 o'clock position.
trans-unit.target: startAngle和spanAngle必须以1/16度为单位指定,即一个完整的圆等于5760(16*360)。角度的正值表示逆时针方向,而负值表示顺时针方向。零度是在3点钟位置。

trans-unit.source: The starting acceleraton of the particles emitted.
trans-unit.target: 发射的粒子的起始加速度。

trans-unit.source: The starting and ending positions of table rows can be found by moving a cursor within a table, and using the rowStart() and rowEnd() functions to obtain cursors at the start and end of each row.
trans-unit.target: 通过在表中移动光标，并使用rowStart（）和rowEnd（）函数在每行的开始和结束处获取光标，可以找到表行的开始和结束位置。

trans-unit.source: The starting angle of the pie.
trans-unit.target: 饼的起始角度。

trans-unit.source: The starting angle of this slice in the series it belongs to. A full pie is 360 degrees, where 0 degrees is at 12 a'clock. Updated automatically once the slice is added to the series.
trans-unit.target: 在它所属的系列中,这块饼的起始角度。一个完整的饼是360度,其中0度是在12点钟方向。一旦该片被添加到系列中,就会自动更新。

trans-unit.source: The starting point for the thread. After calling start(), the newly created thread calls this function. The default implementation simply calls exec().
trans-unit.target: 线程的起点。调用start（）后，新创建的线程将调用此函数。默认实现只是调用exec（）。

trans-unit.source: The starting velocity of the particles emitted.
trans-unit.target: 粒子发射的起始速度。

trans-unit.source: The startup ID of the first window comes from the environment variable DESKTOP_STARTUP_ID. This method is useful for subsequent windows, when the request comes from another process (e.g. via DBus).
trans-unit.target: 第一个窗口的启动ID来自于环境变量DESKTOP_STARTUP_ID。当请求来自另一个进程(例如通过DBus)时,这个方法对后续的窗口很有用。

trans-unit.source: The state being changed in this event can be retrieved through
trans-unit.target: 在该事件中被改变的状态可以通过

trans-unit.source: The state being changed in this event can be retrieved through the
trans-unit.target: 在该事件中被改变的状态可以通过该事件中的

trans-unit.source: The state being extended is treated as the base state in regards to the changes specified by the extending state.
trans-unit.target: 被扩展的状态对于扩展状态所指定的变化,被视为基本状态。

trans-unit.source: The state can be one of these two:
trans-unit.target: 国家可以是这两个中的一个。

trans-unit.source: The state can only be obtained once the SSL connection starts, but not necessarily before it's done. Some settings may change during the course of the SSL connection without need to restart it (for instance, the cipher can be changed over time).
trans-unit.target: 状态只能在SSL连接开始后才能获得,但不一定是在SSL连接完成之前。在SSL连接的过程中,有些设置可能会改变,而不需要重新启动它(例如,密码可以随着时间的推移而改变)。

trans-unit.source: The state emits the State::finished() signal when a final child state (FinalState) is entered.
trans-unit.target: 当进入最终的子状态（FinalState）时，该状态发出State :: finished（）信号。

trans-unit.source: The state emits the QState::finished() signal when a final child state (QFinalState) is entered.
trans-unit.target: 输入最终的子状态（QFinalState）时，该状态发出QState :: finished（）信号。

trans-unit.source: The state graph in the State Machine framework is hierarchical. States can be nested inside of other states, and the current configuration of the state machine consists of the set of states which are currently active. All the states in a valid configuration of the state machine will have a common ancestor.
trans-unit.target: 状态机框架中的状态图是分层的。状态可以嵌套在其他状态的内部,状态机的当前配置由当前处于活动状态的状态集组成。状态机有效配置中的所有状态将有一个共同的祖先。

trans-unit.source: The state is considered to be online for as long as allConfigurations(QNetworkConfiguration::Active) returns a list with at least one entry.
trans-unit.target: 只要allConfigurations（QNetworkConfiguration :: Active）返回具有至少一个条目的列表，该状态就被视为处于联机状态。

trans-unit.source: The state is fast forwarded to determine the complete set of end values.
trans-unit.target: 状态快进,以确定完整的终值集。

trans-unit.source: The state is fully applied, with transitions.
trans-unit.target: 状态是完全应用,有过渡。

trans-unit.source: The state is rewound.
trans-unit.target: 态被重。

trans-unit.source: The state machine defined in the previous section never finishes. In order for a state machine to be able to finish, it needs to have a top-level
trans-unit.target: 上一节中定义的状态机永远不会完成。为了让一个状态机能够完成,它需要有一个顶层的

trans-unit.source: The state machine executes asynchronously, i.e. it becomes part of your application's event loop.
trans-unit.target: 状态机是异步执行的,也就是说,它成为你的应用程序的事件循环的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The state machine instance.
trans-unit.target: 状态机实例。

trans-unit.source: The state machine processes events and takes transitions until a top-level final state is entered; the state machine then emits the finished() signal. You can also stop() the state machine explicitly. The stopped() signal is emitted in this case.
trans-unit.target: 状态机处理事件并进行转换，直到进入顶级最终状态为止。然后状态机发出完成（）信号。您也可以显式停止（）状态机。的停止（）信号被发射在这种情况下。

trans-unit.source: The state machine processes events and takes transitions until a top-level final state is entered; the state machine then emits the finished() signal. You can also stop() the state machine explicitly (you can also set running property to false). The stopped signal is emitted in this case.
trans-unit.target: 状态机处理事件并进行转换，直到进入顶级最终状态为止。然后状态机发出finish（）信号。您还可以显式地停止（）状态机（也可以将running属性设置为false）。在这种情况下发出停止信号。

trans-unit.source: The state machine runs asynchronously to become part of your application's event loop.
trans-unit.target: 状态机异步运行,成为应用程序事件循环的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The state machine should not save the initial values of properties and restore them later.
trans-unit.target: 状态机不应该保存属性的初始值,以后再恢复。

trans-unit.source: The state machine should save the initial values of properties and restore them later.
trans-unit.target: 状态机应该保存属性的初始值,以后再恢复。

trans-unit.source: The state machine that invoked the services.
trans-unit.target: 调用服务的状态机。

trans-unit.source: The state machine that sends out the event.
trans-unit.target: 发出事件的状态机。

trans-unit.source: The state of the A button. The value is true when pressed, and false when not pressed.
trans-unit.target: A按钮的状态。按下时值为 true ，未按下时为 false 。

trans-unit.source: The state of the B button. The value is true when pressed, and false when not pressed.
trans-unit.target: B按钮的状态。按下时值为 true ，未按下时为 false 。

trans-unit.source: The state of the Select button. The value is true when pressed, and false when not pressed. This button can sometimes be labeled as the Back button on some gamepads.
trans-unit.target: 选择按钮的状态。按下时值为 true ，未按下时为 false 。在某些游戏手柄上，有时可以将此按钮标记为“后退”按钮。

trans-unit.source: The state of the Start button. The value is true when pressed, and false when not pressed. This button can sometimes be labeled as the Forward button on some gamepads.
trans-unit.target: 开始按钮的状态。按下时值为 true ，未按下时为 false 。在某些游戏手柄上，有时可以将此按钮标记为“前进”按钮。

trans-unit.source: The state of the X button. The value is true when pressed, and false when not pressed.
trans-unit.target: X按钮的状态。按下时值为 true ，未按下时为 false 。

trans-unit.source: The state of the Y button. The value is true when pressed, and false when not pressed.
trans-unit.target: Y按钮的状态。按下时值为 true ，未按下时为 false 。

trans-unit.source: The state of the application has changed.
trans-unit.target: 应用的状态已经改变。

trans-unit.source: The state of the center button. The value is true when pressed, and false when not pressed.
trans-unit.target: 中央按钮的状态。按下时值为 true ，未按下时为 false 。

trans-unit.source: The state of the checkbox can be set with the checked property.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用checked属性设置复选框的状态。

trans-unit.source: The state of the computation represented by a QFuture can be queried using the isCanceled(), isStarted(), isFinished(), isRunning(), or isPaused() functions.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用isCanceled（），isStarted（），isFinished（），isRunning（）或isPaused（）函数查询QFuture表示的计算状态。

trans-unit.source: The state of the computation represented by a QFuture can be queried using the isCanceled(), isStarted(), isFinished(), isRunning(), isSuspending() or isSuspended() functions.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用isCanceled（），isStarted（），isFinished（），isRunning（），isSuspending（）或isSuspended（）函数查询由QFuture表示的计算状态。

trans-unit.source: The state of the computation represented by a QFuture can be queried using the isCanceled(), isStarted(), isFinished(), isRunning(), or isPaused() functions.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用isCanceled（），isStarted（），isFinished（），isRunning（）或isPaused（）函数查询由QFuture表示的计算状态。

trans-unit.source: The state of the direction pad down button. The value is true when pressed, and false when not pressed.
trans-unit.target: 方向盘下降按钮的状态。按下时值为 true ，未按下时为 false 。

trans-unit.source: The state of the direction pad left button. The value is true when pressed, and false when not pressed.
trans-unit.target: 方向盘左按钮的状态。按下时值为 true ，未按下时为 false 。

trans-unit.source: The state of the direction pad right button. The value is true when pressed, and false when not pressed.
trans-unit.target: 方向盘右键的状态。按下时值为 true ，未按下时为 false 。

trans-unit.source: The state of the direction pad up button. The value is true when pressed, and false when not pressed.
trans-unit.target: 方向盘上移按钮的状态。按下时值为 true ，未按下时为 false 。

trans-unit.source: The state of the event is not modified in the process, so if it is a manual reset event, you will need to reset it after the notification.

trans-unit.source: The state() attribute enables developers to detect whether the system currently maintains a global network session for the given QNetworkConfiguration. If isOpen() returns true the QNetworkSession instance at hand was at least one of the entities requesting the global network session. This distinction is required to support the notion of session registrations. For as long as there are one or more open QNetworkSession instances the underlying network interface is not shut down. Therefore the session state() can be used to monitor the state of network interfaces.
trans-unit.target: state（）属性使开发人员能够检测系统当前是否为给定的QNetworkConfiguration维护了全局网络会话。如果isOpen（）返回 true ,则当前的QNetworkSession实例至少是请求全局网络会话的实体之一。需要这种区别来支持会话注册的概念。只要存在一个或多个打开的QNetworkSession实例，基础网络接口就不会关闭。因此，会话state（）可用于监视网络接口的状态。

trans-unit.source: The states (except NoServiceSet) are derived from QBluetoothSocket::SocketState. This property is read-only. NoServiceSet indicates that the socket state is not yet available due to the service not being set yet.
trans-unit.target: 状态（ NoServiceSet 除外）从QBluetoothSocket :: SocketState派生。该属性是只读的。 NoServiceSet 指示由于尚未设置服务，套接字状态尚不可用。

trans-unit.source: The string "Hello." is stored in the binary and is not allocated at run-time. view is only a view onto the string "Hello.", therefore no copy has to be created. When we copy a QStringView, the viewToView observes the same string as the copied-from view is observing. This means that viewToView does not need to create a copy or an atomic increment. They are views onto the existing string "Hello.".
trans-unit.target: 字符串 "Hello." 存储在二进制文件中，并且不会在运行时分配。 view 只是字符串 "Hello." 的视图。，因此无需创建任何副本。当我们复制QStringView时， viewToView 观察到的字符串与复制源 view 所观察到的字符串相同。这意味着 viewToView 不需要创建副本或原子增量。它们是现有字符串 "Hello." 视图。。

trans-unit.source: The string-based connection syntax provides a workaround for this rule: If the slot has default parameters, those parameters can be omitted from the signal. When the signal is emitted with fewer arguments than the slot, Qt runs the slot using default parameter values.
trans-unit.target: 基于字符串的连接语法为这一规则提供了一个变通方法:如果槽有默认参数,这些参数可以从信号中省略。当信号发出时,其参数比槽的参数少,Qt就会使用默认参数值运行槽。

trans-unit.source: The string-based syntax can connect C++ objects to QML objects, but the functor-based syntax cannot. This is because QML types are resolved at run-time, so they are not available to the C++ compiler.
trans-unit.target: 基于字符串的语法可以将C++对象与QML对象连接起来,但基于漏子的语法却不能。这是因为QML类型是在运行时解析的,所以C++编译器无法使用它们。

trans-unit.source: The structured representation of a text document presents its contents as a hierarchy of text blocks, frames, tables, and other objects. These provide a logical structure to the document and describe how their contents will be displayed. Generally, frames and tables are used to group other structures while text blocks contain the actual textual information.
trans-unit.target: 文本文档的结构化表示将其内容以文本块、框架、表格和其他对象的层次结构呈现。这些对象为文档提供了一个逻辑结构,并描述了如何显示其内容。一般来说,框架和表格用于组合其他结构,而文本块则包含实际的文本信息。

trans-unit.source: The structures for radio and check buttons are identical. We show the structure using QCheckBox element and pixel metric names:
trans-unit.target: 单选按钮和复选按钮的结构相同。我们使用QCheckBox元素和像素指标名称显示结构：

trans-unit.source: The style Component for the window.
trans-unit.target: 窗口的样式组件。

trans-unit.source: The style Component for this control.
trans-unit.target: 该控件的样式组件。

trans-unit.source: The style also contains a set of style hints, which is represented as values in the StyleHint enum. All widgets do not have the same functionality and look in the different styles. For instance, when the menu items in a menu do not fit in a single column on the screen, some styles support scrolling while others draw more than one column to fit all items.
trans-unit.target: 样式还包含一组样式提示，这些提示在StyleHint枚举中表示为值。所有小部件均不具有相同的功能，并且外观不同。例如，当菜单中的菜单项不适合屏幕上的一列时，某些样式支持滚动，而另一些样式则绘制多于一列的样式以适合所有项目。

trans-unit.source: The style calculates the spacing between widgets in layouts. There are two ways the style can handle these calculations. You can set the PM_LayoutHorizontalSpacing and PM_LayoutVerticalSpacing, which is the way the Java style does it (through QCommonStyle). Alternatively, you can implement QStyle::layoutSpacing() and QStyle::layoutSpacingImplementation() if you need more control over this part of the layout. In these functions you can calculate the spacing based on control types (QSizePolicy::ControlType) for different size policies (QSizePolicy::Policy) and also the style option for the widget in question.
trans-unit.target: 样式计算布局中小部件之间的间距。样式可以通过两种方式处理这些计算。您可以设置 PM_LayoutHorizontalSpacing 和 PM_LayoutVerticalSpacing ，这是Java样式（通过QCommonStyle）的方式。另外，如果您需要对布局的这一部分进行更多控制，则可以实现QStyle :: layoutSpacing（）和QStyle :: layoutSpacingImplementation（）。在这些函数中，您可以基于控件类型（QSizePolicy :: ControlType）为不同的大小策略（QSizePolicy :: Policy）以及相关小部件的样式选项计算间距。

trans-unit.source: The style can also be specified as a path to a custom style, such as ":/mystyle". See Creating a Custom Style for more details about building custom styles. Custom styles do not need to implement all controls. By default, the styling system uses the Default style as a fallback for controls that a custom style does not provide. It is possible to specify a different fallback style to customize or extend one of the built-in styles.
trans-unit.target: 样式也可以指定为自定义样式的路径，例如 ":/mystyle" 。有关创建自定义样式的更多详细信息，请参见创建自定义样式。自定义样式不需要实现所有控件。默认情况下，样式系统使用“默认”样式作为自定义样式未提供的控件的后备。可以指定其他后备样式以自定义或扩展内置样式之一。

trans-unit.source: The style can also be specified as a path to a custom style, such as ":/mystyle". See Creating a Custom Style for more details about building custom styles. Custom styles do not need to implement all controls. By default, the styling system uses the Default style as a fallback for controls that a custom style does not provide. It is possible to specify a different fallback style to customize or extend one of the built-in styles.
trans-unit.target: 样式也可以指定为自定义样式的路径，例如 ":/mystyle" 。有关创建自定义样式的更多详细信息，请参见创建自定义样式。自定义样式不需要实现所有控件。默认情况下，样式系统使用默认样式作为自定义样式未提供的控件的后备。可以指定其他后备样式以自定义或扩展内置样式之一。

trans-unit.source: The style component for the menubar's own menus and their submenus.
trans-unit.target: menubar自己的菜单和子菜单的样式组件。

trans-unit.source: The style does not handle reverse layouts. We assume that the layout direction is left to right. QCommonStyle handles reverse widgets; if we implemented reverse layouts, widgets that we change the position of sub elements, or handle text alignment in labels ourselves would need to be updated.
trans-unit.target: 样式不处理反向布局。我们假设布局方向是从左到右。QCommonStyle处理反向小部件；如果我们实现反向布局，则我们需要更新更改子元素位置或处理标签中文本对齐的小部件。

trans-unit.source: The style elements and widgets, as mentioned, use the style to calculate bounding rectangles of sub elements and sub controls. Pixel metrics, which are style-dependent sizes in screen pixels, are also used for measurements when drawing. The available rectangles and pixel metrics are represented by three enums in QStyle: SubElement, SubControl, and PixelMetric. Values of the enums can easily by identified as they start with SE_, SC_ and PM_.
trans-unit.target: 如前所述，样式元素和小部件使用样式来计算子元素和子控件的边界矩形。像素度量是屏幕像素中与样式相关的大小，在绘制时也用于测量。可用的矩形和像素度量由QStyle中的三个枚举表示：SubElement，SubControl和PixelMetric。枚举的值可以很容易地确定，因为它们以SE_，SC_和PM_开头。

trans-unit.source: The style expects the needle to be pointing up at a rotation of 0, in order for the rotation to be correct. For example:
trans-unit.target: 该样式希望指针指向 0 的旋转角度，以便正确旋转。例如：

trans-unit.source: The style gets all the information it needs to render the graphical element from the QStyleOption class. The widget is passed as the last argument in case the style needs it to perform special effects (such as animated default buttons on macOS), but it isn't mandatory. In fact, QStyle can be used to draw on any paint device (not just widgets), in which case the widget argument is a zero pointer.
trans-unit.target: 样式从QStyleOption类获取呈现图形元素所需的所有信息。如果样式需要其执行特殊效果（例如macOS上的动画默认按钮），则将其作为最后一个参数传递，但这不是强制性的。实际上，QStyle可用于在任何绘画设备（不仅仅是小部件）上绘制，在这种情况下，小部件参数是零指针。

trans-unit.source: The style gets all the information it needs to render the graphical element from the QStyleOption class. The widget is passed as the last argument in case the style needs it to perform special effects (such as animated default buttons on macOS), but it isn't mandatory. In fact, QStyle can be used to draw on any paint device (not just widgets), in which case the widget argument is a zero pointer.
trans-unit.target: 样式从QStyleOption类获取呈现图形元素所需的所有信息。如果样式需要其执行特殊效果（例如macOS上的动画默认按钮），则将其作为最后一个参数传递，但这不是强制性的。实际上，QStyle可用于在任何绘画设备（不仅仅是小部件）上绘制，在这种情况下，小部件参数为零指针。

trans-unit.source: The style hint affects the font matching algorithm. See QFont::StyleHint for the list of available hints.
trans-unit.target: 样式提示会影响字体匹配算法。有关可用提示的列表，请参见QFont :: StyleHint。

trans-unit.source: The style hints encapsulate a set of platform dependent properties such as double click intervals, full width selection and others.
trans-unit.target: 样式提示封装了一组平台依赖性属性,如双击间隔、全宽选择等。

trans-unit.source: The style is automatically selected and deployed on Android. See Getting Started with Qt for Android and Deploying an Application on Android for more details on the Android essentials.
trans-unit.target: 样式会自动选择并部署在Android上。见入门使用Qt针对Android和部署在Android应用程序用于在Android要领的更多细节。

trans-unit.source: The style is automatically selected and deployed on Android. See Getting Started with Qt for Android and Deploying an Application on Android for more details on the Android essentials.
trans-unit.target: 样式会自动选择并部署在Android上。见入门使用Qt针对Android和部署在Android应用程序用于在Android要领的更多细节。

trans-unit.source: The style is implemented in one class. We have done this because we find it convenient to keep all code in one file. Also, it is an advantage with regards to optimization as we instantiate less objects. We also keep the number of functions at a minimum by using switches to identify which element to draw in the functions. This results in large functions, but since we divide the code for each element in the switches, the code should still be easy to read.
trans-unit.target: 风格是在一个类中实现的。我们这样做是因为我们发现将所有代码保存在一个文件中很方便。同时,这也是优化的一个优势,因为我们实例化的对象更少。我们还通过使用开关来确定在函数中绘制哪个元素,从而使函数的数量保持在最低限度。这将导致函数的数量很大,但由于我们在开关中为每个元素划分了代码,所以代码应该还是容易阅读的。

trans-unit.source: The style is selected by default when running Qt Quick Controls 2 applications. It is built into the module's resources, so by default it is shipped with any application that depends on the Qt Quick Controls 2 module
trans-unit.target: 当运行Qt Quick Controls 2应用程序时,默认情况下会选择该样式。它内置在模块的资源中,所以默认情况下,任何依赖于Qt Quick Controls 2模块的应用程序都会使用它。

trans-unit.source: The style used to decorate each item is set with setStyle() and can be read with the style() function. The style controls the type of bullet points and numbering scheme used for items in the list. Note that lists that use the decimal numbering scheme begin counting at 1 rather than 0.
trans-unit.target: 用于装饰每个项目的样式由setStyle（）设置，并且可以通过style（）函数读取。样式控制用于列表中项目的项目符号点的类型和编号方案。请注意，使用十进制编号方案的列表从1而不是0开始计数。

trans-unit.source: The stylesheet editor can be accessed by right-clicking a widget and selecting Change styleSheet...
trans-unit.target: 可以通过右键单击小部件并选择Change styleSheet来访问样式表编辑器。

trans-unit.source: The sub-classes of QStyleOption contain all information necessary to style the individual elements. Style options are instantiated - usually on the stack - and filled out by the caller of the QStyle function. Depending on what is drawn the style will expect different a different style option class. For example, the QStyle::PE_FrameFocusRect element expects a QStyleOptionFocusRect argument, and it's possible to create custom subclasses that a custom style can use. The style options keep public variables for performance reasons.
trans-unit.target: QStyleOption的子类包含样式各个元素所需的所有信息。样式选项被实例化-通常在堆栈上-并由QStyle函数的调用者填写。根据绘制的样式，样式将期望不同的样式选项类。例如， QStyle::PE_FrameFocusRect 元素需要一个QStyleOptionFocusRect参数，并且可以创建自定义样式可以使用的自定义子类。出于性能原因，样式选项保留公共变量。

trans-unit.source: The supported set of attributes provided by the HERE plugin are not fixed and may grow over time. Also the attributes provided may vary according to a place by place basis, e.g one place may provide opening hours while another does not. At the time of writing, it is known that some places provide openingHours (QPlaceAttribute::OpeningHours) and payment (QPlaceAttribute::Payment) methods but other attributes may be made available by the backend server. All places provided by the plugin will have the x_provider (QPlaceAttribute::Provider) attribute set to here.
trans-unit.target: HERE插件提供的受支持的属性集不是固定的，并且会随着时间的推移而增长。同样，所提供的属性可能会根据地点的不同而有所不同，例如，一个地方可能提供营业时间，而另一个地方没有提供营业时间。在写这篇文章的时候，已经知道一些地方提供 openingHours （QPlaceAttribute :: OpeningHours）和 payment （QPlaceAttribute ::付款）方式，但可以通过后端服务器提供的其它属性。插件提供的所有位置都将 x_provider （QPlaceAttribute :: Provider）属性设置为 here 。

trans-unit.source: The system time clock is purely the real time, expressed in milliseconds since Jan 1, 1970 at 0:00 UTC. It's equivalent to the value returned by the C and POSIX time function, with the milliseconds added. This clock type is currently only used on Unix systems that do not support monotonic clocks (see below).
trans-unit.target: 系统时钟纯粹是实时时间，以1970年1月1日世界标准时间0:00为单位的毫秒数表示。它等于C和POSIX time 函数返回的值，加上毫秒。当前仅在不支持单调时钟的Unix系统上使用此时钟类型（请参见下文）。

trans-unit.source: The tab focus chain traverses elements by first visiting the parent, and then its children in the order they occur in the children property. Pressing the tab key on an item in the tab focus chain will move keyboard focus to the next item in the chain. Pressing BackTab (normally Shift+Tab) will move focus to the previous item.

trans-unit.source: The tab order is defined by clicking on each of the numbers in the correct order. The first number you click will change to red, indicating the currently edited position in the tab order chain. The widget associated with the number will become the first one in the tab order chain. Clicking on another widget will make it the second in the tab order, and so on.

trans-unit.source: The table currently being edited by the cursor is found with QTextCursor::currentTable(). This allows its format or dimensions to be changed after it has been inserted into a document.

trans-unit.source: The table format also provides a way to constrain the widths of the columns in the table. Columns can be assigned a fixed width, a variable width, or a percentage of the available width (see QTextLength). The columns() function returns the number of columns with constraints, and the columnWidthConstraints() function returns the constraints defined for the table. These quantities can also be set by calling setColumnWidthConstraints() with a list containing new constraints. If no constraints are required, clearColumnWidthConstraints() can be used to remove them.
trans-unit.target: 表格格式还提供了一种限制表格中列宽度的方法。可以为列分配固定宽度，可变宽度或可用宽度的百分比（请参见QTextLength）。的列（）函数返回与约束的列的数量，以及columnWidthConstraints（）函数返回为表中定义的约束。也可以通过使用包含新约束的列表调用setColumnWidthConstraints（）来设置这些数量。如果不需要任何约束，则可以使用clearColumnWidthConstraints（）删除它们。

trans-unit.source: The table format also provides a way to constrain the widths of the columns in the table. Columns can be assigned a fixed width, a variable width, or a percentage of the available width (see QTextLength). The columns() function returns the number of columns with constraints, and the columnWidthConstraints() function returns the constraints defined for the table. These quantities can also be set by calling setColumnWidthConstraints() with a vector containing new constraints. If no constraints are required, clearColumnWidthConstraints() can be used to remove them.
trans-unit.target: 表格式还提供了一种约束表中列宽度的方法。可以为列分配固定宽度，可变宽度或可用宽度的百分比（请参见QTextLength）。的列（）函数返回与约束的列的数量，以及columnWidthConstraints（）函数返回为表中定义的约束。也可以通过使用包含新约束的向量调用setColumnWidthConstraints（）来设置这些数量。如果不需要任何约束，则可以使用clearColumnWidthConstraints（）删除它们。

trans-unit.source: The table format is either defined when the table is created or changed later with setFormat().
trans-unit.target: 表格式可以在创建表时定义，也可以稍后使用setFormat（）进行更改。

trans-unit.source: The table has a vertical header that can be obtained using the verticalHeader() function, and a horizontal header that is available through the horizontalHeader() function. The height of each row in the table can be found by using rowHeight(); similarly, the width of columns can be found using columnWidth(). Since both of these are plain widgets, you can hide either of them using their hide() functions.
trans-unit.target: 该表具有可以使用verticalHeader（）函数获得的垂直标题，以及可以通过horizo​​ntalHeader（）函数获得的水平标题。可以通过使用rowHeight（）找到表中每一行的高度；同样，可以使用columnWidth（）找到列的宽度。由于这两个都是简单的小部件，因此您可以使用它们的hide（）函数隐藏它们中的任何一个。

trans-unit.source: The table must have a primary key declared.
trans-unit.target: 该表必须声明一个主键。

trans-unit.source: The table takes ownership of the item.
trans-unit.target: 该表对该项目拥有所有权。

trans-unit.source: The table takes ownership of the prototype.
trans-unit.target: 该表对原型的所有权。

trans-unit.source: The table view's default selection model is retrieved for later use. We do not modify any items in the model, but instead select a few items that the view will display at the top-left of the table. To do this, we need to retrieve the model indexes corresponding to the top-left and bottom-right items in the region to be selected:
trans-unit.target: 表视图的默认选择模型被检索出来,供以后使用。我们不修改模型中的任何项,而是选择视图将显示在表格左上角的几个项。要做到这一点,我们需要检索要选择的区域中左上角和右下角项目所对应的模型索引。

trans-unit.source: The table widget will use the item prototype clone function when it needs to create a new table item. For example when the user is editing in an empty cell. This is useful when you have a QTableWidgetItem subclass and want to make sure that QTableWidget creates instances of your subclass.
trans-unit.target: 当需要创建新表项时，表小部件将使用项原型克隆功能。例如，当用户在空单元格中编辑时。当您有QTableWidgetItem子类并且要确保QTableWidget创建子类的实例时，这很有用。

trans-unit.source: The table's background color can be read with the background() function, and can be specified with setBackground(). The background color of each cell can be set independently, and will control the color of the cell within the padded area.
trans-unit.target: 表格的背景颜色可以使用background（）函数读取，也可以使用setBackground（）指定。可以独立设置每个单元格的背景颜色，并控制填充区域内单元格的颜色。

trans-unit.source: The table's primary key may not contain a relation to another table.
trans-unit.target: 该表的主键不得包含与另一表的关系。

trans-unit.source: The table-like interface to item data provided by models is ideal when using data in a table or list view; the row and column number system maps exactly to the way the views display items. However, structures such as tree views require the model to expose a more flexible interface to the items within. As a result, each item can also be the parent of another table of items, in much the same way that a top-level item in a tree view can contain another list of items.
trans-unit.target: 当使用表格或列表视图中的数据时,模型提供的类似表格的项目数据接口是非常理想的;行号和列号系统与视图显示项目的方式完全对应。然而,树状视图等结构要求模型对其中的项暴露出更灵活的接口。因此,每个项也可以是另一个项表的父项,就像树形视图中的顶层项可以包含另一个项列表一样。

trans-unit.source: The test framework will iterate over all of the rows in the table and pass each row to the test function. As shown, the columns can be extracted for use in the test. The tag column is special - it is printed by the test framework when a row fails, to help the reader identify which case failed amongst a set of otherwise passing tests.
trans-unit.target: 测试框架将遍历表中的所有行，并将每一行传递给测试函数。如图所示，可以提取这些列以用于测试。该 tag 栏是特殊的-它是由测试框架打印时连续失败，以帮助读者识别哪些情况下未能集合之中，否则测试通过。

trans-unit.source: The test harness scans the specified source directory recursively for "tst_*.qml" files. If QUICK_TEST_SOURCE_DIR is not defined, then the current directory will be scanned when the harness is run. Other *.qml files may appear for auxillary QML components that are used by the test.
trans-unit.target: 测试工具递归扫描指定的源目录中的“ tst _ *。qml”文件。如果 QUICK_TEST_SOURCE_DIR ，则在运行线束时将扫描当前目录。对于测试使用的辅助QML组件，可能会出现其他* .qml文件。

trans-unit.source: The test results are automatically cached, which also makes them available to all subprojects. It is therefore recommended to run all configuration tests in the top-level project file.

trans-unit.source: The test's own data is a single number per row. In this case, initTestCase_data() also supplies a locale per row. Therefore, this test will be run with every combination of locale from the latter and number from the former. Thus, with four rows in the global table and three in the local, the test function is run for 12 distinct test-cases (4 * 3 = 12).
trans-unit.target: 测试本身的数据是每行一个数字。在这种情况下， initTestCase_data() 还为每行提供一个语言环境。因此，将使用来自后者的区域设置和来自前者的数字的每种组合来运行此测试。因此，对于全局表中的四行和局部表中的三行，将针对12个不同的测试用例（4 * 3 = 12）运行测试函数。

trans-unit.source: The text is set or replaced using setPlainText() which deletes the existing text and replaces it with the text passed to setPlainText().

trans-unit.source: The text is set or replaced using setHtml() which deletes any existing text and replaces it with the text passed in the setHtml() call. If you call setHtml() with legacy HTML, and then call toHtml(), the text that is returned may have different markup, but will render the same. The entire text can be deleted with clear().
trans-unit.target: 使用setHtml（）设置或替换文本，该函数将删除所有现有文本，并将其替换为setHtml（）调用中传递的文本。如果使用旧版HTML 调用setHtml（），然后调用toHtml（），则返回的文本可能具有不同的标记，但将呈现相同的标记。可以使用clear（）删除整个文本。

trans-unit.source: The text layout creates a new line object that starts after the last line in the layout, or at the beginning if the layout is empty. trans-unit.source: The text on the //~ line is optional extra information. The first word of the text is used as an additional identifier in the XML element in the .ts file so make sure the first word is not part of the sentence. For example, the comment "Context Not related to that" is converted to "<extra-Context>Not related to that" in the .ts file.
trans-unit.target: //~ 行上的文本是可选的附加信息。文本的第一个单词用作.ts文件中XML元素中的附加标识符，因此请确保第一个单词不是句子的一部分。例如，.ts文件中的注释“与该上下文不相关”被转换为“ <与该上下文不相关的上下文”。

trans-unit.source: The text rendering with the Software adaptation is based on software rasterization and does not respond as well to transformations such as scaling, compared to when using OpenGL. The quality is similar to choosing Text.NativeRendering with Text items.
trans-unit.target: 与使用OpenGL相比，使用“软件”改编的文本呈现基于软件光栅化，并且对诸如缩放之类的转换没有很好的响应。其质量类似于选择带有Text项的Text.NativeRendering。

trans-unit.source: The text representation of JSON encloses arrays in square brackets ([ ... ]) and objects in curly brackets ({ ... }). Entries in arrays and objects are separated by commas. The separator between keys and values in an object is a colon (:).
trans-unit.target: JSON的文本表示方法是将数组用方括号([...])括起来,将对象用大括号({...})括起来。数组和对象中的条目用逗号分隔。对象中键和值之间的分隔符是冒号(:)。

trans-unit.source: The text that we add last is inserted after the child frame in the document. Since each frame is padded with text blocks, this ensures that more elements can always be inserted with a cursor.

trans-unit.source: The text width specifies the preferred width for text in the document. If the text (or content in general) is wider than the specified with it is broken into multiple lines and grows vertically. If the text cannot be broken into multiple lines to fit into the specified text width it will be larger and the size() and the idealWidth() property will reflect that.
trans-unit.target: 文本宽度指定文档中文本的首选宽度。如果文本（或通常的内容）比指定的宽，它将分成多行并垂直增长。如果文本不能分成多行以适合指定的文本宽度，它将变大，并且size（）和IdealWidth（）属性将反映出来。

trans-unit.source: The text will be drawn using the font and the transformation set on the painter. trans-unit.source: The text, font, position, scaling, rotation, and colors of a custom label can be set. In addition, the visibility of the borders and background of the label can be toggled. Colors, borders, and background are determined by the active theme unless set explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 可以设置自定义标签的文字、字体、位置、缩放、旋转和颜色。此外,还可以切换标签的边框和背景的可见性。除非明确设置,否则颜色、边框和背景由活动主题决定。

trans-unit.source: The text-property is mostly suitable for setting the initial content and handling modifications to relatively small text content. The append(), insert() and remove() methods provide more fine-grained control and remarkably better performance for modifying especially large rich text content.
trans-unit.target: 文本属性最适合设置初始内容并处理对较小文本内容的修改。该追加（） ，插入（）和删除（）方法提供更精细的控制和修改特别是大富文本内容显着更好的性能。

trans-unit.target: 项目的纹理文件名。如果没有设置,将使用纯灰色纹理。

trans-unit.source: The texture is a wrapper around an OpenGL texture, which texture id is given by textureId() and which size in pixels is given by textureSize(). hasAlphaChannel() reports if the texture contains opacity values and hasMipmaps() reports if the texture contains mipmap levels.
trans-unit.target: 该纹理是OpenGL纹理的包装，该纹理id由textureId（）给出，而其像素大小由textureSize（）给出。hasAlphaChannel（）报告纹理是否包含不透明度值，hasMipmaps（）报告纹理是否包含mipmap级别。

trans-unit.source: The texture object is opaque.
trans-unit.target: 纹理对象是不透明的。

trans-unit.source: The texture object owns the texture id and will delete the GL texture when the texture object is deleted.
trans-unit.target: 纹理对象拥有纹理id,当纹理对象被删除时,将删除GL纹理。

trans-unit.source: The texture object owns the texture id and will delete the OpenGL texture when the texture object is deleted.
trans-unit.target: 纹理对象拥有纹理id,当纹理对象被删除时,将删除OpenGL纹理。

trans-unit.source: The texture path uses a 2D Qt Quick scene to create dynamic texture content. Consider the following Texture definition:
trans-unit.target: 纹理路径使用2D Qt Quick场景来创建动态纹理内容。考虑以下Texture定义。

trans-unit.source: The texture to be rendered can be set using setTexture(). How the texture should be rendered can be specified using setMipmapFiltering(), setFiltering(), setHorizontalWrapMode() and setVerticalWrapMode(). The rendering state is set on the texture instance just before it is bound.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用setTexture（）设置要渲染的纹理。可以使用setMipmapFiltering（），setFiltering（），setHorizo​​ntalWrapMode（）和setVerticalWrapMode（）指定如何渲染纹理。在绑定绑定实例之前，在纹理实例上设置渲染状态。

trans-unit.source: The texture will return false for QSGTexture::hasAlphaChannel() and will not be blended. This flag was added in Qt 5.6.
trans-unit.target: 对于QSGTexture :: hasAlphaChannel（），纹理将返回false，并且不会被混合。这个标志是在Qt 5.6中添加的。

trans-unit.source: The textured material respects the current matrix and the alpha channel of the texture. It will also respect the accumulated opacity in the scenegraph.
trans-unit.target: 纹理材质会尊重当前的矩阵和纹理的alpha通道。它也会尊重场景图中累积的不透明度。

trans-unit.source: The textured material will fill every pixel in a geometry with the supplied texture.
trans-unit.target: 纹理材质将用提供的纹理填充几何体中的每个像素。

trans-unit.source: The the meaning of the keys is equivalent to ConfigurationKey. If a key is not explicitly mentioned the platform's default setting for the relevant key is used.
trans-unit.target: 键的含义与ConfigurationKey等效。如果未明确提及密钥，则使用平台相关密钥的默认设置。

trans-unit.source: The theme used by the chart.
trans-unit.target: 图表使用的主题。

trans-unit.source: The thickness of the slice frames for each dimension. The values are fractions of the volume thickness in the same dimension. The values cannot be negative.
trans-unit.target: 每个维度的切片框架厚度。值是同一维度的体积厚度的分数。值不能为负数。

trans-unit.source: The third QPushButton spans 2 columns. This is possible by specifying 2 as the fifth argument to QGridLayout::addWidget().
trans-unit.target: 第三个QPushButton跨越2列。通过将2指定为QGridLayout :: addWidget（）的第五个参数，可以实现此目的。

trans-unit.source: The third and fourth paths will be looked up within the QML engine's import path list. This is the same as what happens when you pass Material as the style, for example.
trans-unit.target: 将在QML引擎的导入路径列表中查找第三和第四路径。例如，这与将 Material 用作样式时发生的情况相同。

trans-unit.source: The third class generated in the header is <Type>SourceAPI. This is a templated class, for use specifically by the templated version of QRemoteObjectHostBase::enableRemoting(), which allows you to use any QObject that supports the required API as the source. Use this class to hide or convert properties or signal/slot parameters. If your implementation does not provide the correct API, there will be compile-time warnings.
trans-unit.target: 标头中生成的第三类是<Type> SourceAPI。这是一个模板化类，专门供QRemoteObjectHostBase :: enableRemoting（）的模板化版本使用，它允许您使用任何支持所需API的QObject作为源。使用此类可隐藏或转换属性或信号/插槽参数。如果您的实现未提供正确的API，则会出现编译时警告。

trans-unit.source: The third is that QPlaceManager::matchingPlaces() of the destination manager accept the QPlaceMatchRequest::AlternativeId as a parameter key and the alternative identifier attribute key as the value, in this case x_id_<provider name> would be the expected value. This indicates that the identifiers of places in the QPlaceMatchRequest should be matched against the x_id_<provider name> alternative identifier attributes.
trans-unit.target: 第三是目标管理器的QPlaceManager :: matchingPlaces（）接受QPlaceMatchRequest :: AlternativeId作为参数键，并使用替代标识符属性键作为值，在这种情况下， x_id_<provider 名称>将是预期值。这表明QPlaceMatchRequest中位置的标识符应与 x_id_<provider 名称>备用标识符属性进行匹配。

trans-unit.source: The third method is more convenient when you are simply testing your application on a device physically connected to your development machine (or an emulator). It will copy the Qt libraries into a temporary directory on your device and run the application against these instead. An APK built in this way is not distributable, since it relies on the device being prepared to contain the Qt libraries in the correct location. However, since the Qt libraries are only copied into the device once, it benefits from a faster turn-around time, so it's more suited for testing changes to your application during development. This deployment method can be selected by opening the Run settings of your project, expanding Deploy Configurations and choosing Deploy local Qt libraries. Make sure the Use local Qt libraries check box is also ticked.
trans-unit.target: 当您仅在物理上连接到开发机器（或仿真器）的设备上测试应用程序时，第三种方法更方便。它将Qt库复制到设备上的临时目录中，然后针对这些库运行应用程序。不能分发以这种方式构建的APK，因为它依赖于准备在正确位置包含Qt库的设备。但是，由于Qt库仅复制到设备一次，因此它受益于更快的周转时间，因此它更适合在开发过程中测试对应用程序的更改。可以通过打开项目的“运行”设置，展开“ 部署配置”并选择“ 部署本地Qt库”来选择此部署方法。。确保也选中了使用本地Qt库复选框。

trans-unit.source: The thread associated with this QThread object has finished execution (i.e. when it returns from run()). This function will return true if the thread has finished. It also returns true if the thread has not been started yet.

trans-unit.source: The thread support commands are for specifying the level of support for multithreaded programming in a class or function. There are three levels of support: threadsafe, reentrant and nonreentrant.
trans-unit.target: 线程支持命令用于指定类或函数中对多线程编程的支持级别。支持分为三个级别： threadsafe ， reentrant 和 nonreentrant 重入。

trans-unit.source: The threaded renderer is currently used by default on Windows with Direct3D 11 and with OpenGL when using opengl32.dll, Linux excluding Mesa llvmpipe, macOS with Metal, mobile platforms, and Embedded Linux with EGLFS, and with Vulkan regardless of the platform. All this may change in future releases. It is always possible to force use of the threaded renderer by setting QSG_RENDER_LOOP=threaded in the environment.
trans-unit.target: 当前，默认情况下，在使用opengl32.dll的Windows，Direct3D 11和OpenGL上，默认情况下使用线程渲染器；在不包括Mesa llvmpipe的Linux上，在Metal，移动平台和EGLFS的嵌入式Linux上，以及在不考虑平台的情况下，与Vulkan一起使用。所有这些都可能在将来的版本中更改。通过在环境中设置 QSG_RENDER_LOOP=threaded ，始终可以强制使用线程渲染器。

trans-unit.source: The threaded renderer is currently used by default on Windows with opengl32.dll, Linux excluding Mesa llvmpipe, macOS with Metal, mobile platforms, and Embedded Linux with EGLFS, and with Vulkan regardless of the platform, but this is subject to change. It is always possible to force use of the threaded renderer by setting QSG_RENDER_LOOP=threaded in the environment.
trans-unit.target: 当前，默认情况下，线程渲染器在Windows上与opengl32.dll，不包括Mesa llvmpipe的Linux，具有Metal的macOS，移动平台和具有EGLFS的嵌入式Linux以及与Vulkan一起使用，与平台无关，但这可能会发生变化。通过在环境中设置 QSG_RENDER_LOOP=threaded ，始终可以强制使用线程渲染器。

trans-unit.source: The threaded renderer is currently used by default on Windows with opengl32.dll, Linux with non-Mesa based drivers, mobile platforms, and Embedded Linux with EGLFS but this is subject to change. It is possible to force use of the threaded renderer by setting QSG_RENDER_LOOP=threaded in the environment.
trans-unit.target: 当前，默认情况下，线程渲染器在Windows上使用opengl32.dll，在Linux上使用基于非Mesa的驱动程序，移动平台以及在Linux上使用EGLFS，但这可能会有所更改。通过在环境中设置 QSG_RENDER_LOOP=threaded 可以强制使用线程渲染器。

trans-unit.source: The three availables check states are: checked, partially checked and unchecked.
trans-unit.target: 三种可利用的检查状态是:检查、部分检查和未检查。

trans-unit.source: The three dimensional position of an object such as a mobile device can be specified by giving the latitude, longitude and altitude. That is the values held in the l {coordinate} type. Additionally for computation of future positions we would like to know if the object is moving, what speed it is doing and what is the timestamp of the last position data. Position therefore includes values for the coordinate, speed and a timestamp. Position also takes responsibility for validation of sensible values for these properties. These are exposed as the latitudeValid, longitudeValid, altitudeValid, speedValid, horizontalAccuracyValid, and verticalAccuracyValid properties.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过给出纬度，经度和海拔高度来指定诸如移动设备之类的物体的三维位置。这就是l {coordinate}类型中保存的值。另外，为了计算将来的位置，我们想知道对象是否在移动，它在做什么速度以及最后一个位置数据的时间戳是什么。因此，位置包括坐标，速度和时间戳记的值。职位还负责验证这些属性的合理值。这些暴露为latitudeValid，longitudeValid，海拔高度Valid，speedValid，horizo​​ntalAccuracyValid和verticalAccuracyValid属性。

trans-unit.source: The three original states have been renamed s11, s12 and s13 to reflect that they are now children of the new top-level state, s1. Child states implicitly inherit the transitions of their parent state. This means it is now sufficient to add a single transition from s1 to the final state s2. New states added to s1 will also automatically inherit this transition.
trans-unit.target: 这三个原始状态已重命名为 s11 ， s12 和 s13 ,以反映它们现在是新顶级状态 s1 的子级。子状态隐式继承其父状态的转换。这意味着现在添加从 s1 到最终状态 s2 的单个过渡就足够了。添加到 s1 的新状态也将自动继承此过渡。

trans-unit.source: The three original states have been renamed s11, s12 and s13 to reflect that they are now childrens of the new top-level state, s1. Child states implicitly inherit the transitions of their parent state. This means it is now sufficient to add a single transition from s1 to the final state, s2. New states added to s1 will automatically inherit this transition.
trans-unit.target: 这三个原始状态已重命名为 s11 ， s12 和 s13 ,以反映它们现在是新顶级状态 s1 的子状态。子状态隐式继承其父状态的转换。这意味着现在添加从 s1 到最终状态 s2 的单个过渡就足够了。添加到 s1 的新状态将自动继承此过渡。

The default value is QStyleHints::mousePressAndHoldInterval() converted to seconds.

trans-unit.source: The time the CPU should wait, a non-zero value, for the GPU to finish its work after each call to Present(). The default value is 0 (disabled). This behavior effectively kills all parallelism but makes the behavior resemble the traditional swap-blocks-for-vsync model, which can be useful in some special cases. However, this behavior is not the same as setting the frame count to 1 because that still avoids blocking after Present(), and may only block when starting to prepare the next frame (or may not block at all depending on the time gap between the frames).
trans-unit.target: CPU在每次调用Present()后等待GPU完成工作的时间,非零值。默认值为0(禁用)。这个行为有效地扼杀了所有的并行性,但使行为类似于传统的swap-blocks-for-vsync模型,这在一些特殊情况下是有用的。然而,这种行为与将帧数设置为1是不同的,因为这仍然避免了在Present()之后的阻塞,并且可能只有在开始准备下一帧时才会阻塞(或者根据帧之间的时间间隔可能完全不阻塞)。

trans-unit.source: The time zone offset data for a given moment in time, i.e. the time zone offsets and abbreviation to use at that moment in time.

trans-unit.source: The timeline is not running. This is the initial state of QTimeLine, and the state QTimeLine reenters when finished. The current time, frame and value remain unchanged until either setCurrentTime() is called, or the timeline is started by calling start().
trans-unit.target: 时间轴未运行。这是QTimeLine的初始状态，完成后将重新进入QTimeLine状态。当前时间，帧和值保持不变，直到调用setCurrentTime（）或通过调用start（）启动时间轴。

trans-unit.source: The timeline is paused (i.e., temporarily suspended). Calling setPaused(false) will resume timeline activity.
trans-unit.target: 时间线已暂停（即，暂时暂停）。调用setPaused（false）将恢复时间轴活动。

trans-unit.source: The timeline is running. While control is in the event loop, QTimeLine will update its current time at regular intervals, emitting valueChanged() and frameChanged() when appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 时间轴正在运行。当控件处于事件循环中时，QTimeLine将定期更新其当前时间，并在适当的时候发出valueChanged（）和frameChanged（）。

trans-unit.source: The timeline will start from position 0, or the end if going backward. If you want to resume a stopped timeline without restarting, you can call resume() instead.
trans-unit.target: 时间轴将从位置0开始，如果向后，则从结尾开始。如果要恢复已停止的时间轴而不重新启动，则可以调用resume（）。

trans-unit.source: The title of an HTML document can be accessed with the title() property. Additionally, a web site may specify an icon, which can be accessed using the icon() or its URL using the iconUrl() property. If the title or the icon changes, the corresponding titleChanged(), iconChanged() and iconUrlChanged() signals will be emitted. The zoomFactor() property enables zooming the contents of the web page by a scale factor.

trans-unit.source: The title of an HTML page can be accessed with the title property. Additionally, a web page may specify an icon, which can be accessed using the icon property. The zoomFactor property enables zooming the contents of the web page by a scale factor.

trans-unit.source: The title of an HTML page can be accessed with the title() property. Additionally, a page may also specify an icon, which can be accessed using the icon() or its URL using the iconUrl() property. trans-unit.source: The trace interaction is started when an input source detects a new contact point, and calls the traceBegin method for a new trace object. If the input method accepts the interaction, it creates a new trace object and returns it to the caller. From this point on, trace data is collected until the traceEnd method is called.
trans-unit.target: 当输入源检测到一个新的接触点时,开始进行跟踪交互,并调用traceBegin方法以获得一个新的跟踪对象。如果输入方法接受了交互,它就会创建一个新的跟踪对象并将其返回给调用者。从这一点开始,跟踪数据被收集,直到调用traceEnd方法。

trans-unit.source: The tradition of "Manhattan length" arises because such distances apply to travelers who can only travel on a rectangular grid, like the streets of Manhattan.
trans-unit.target: "曼哈顿长度 "的传统之所以产生,是因为这样的距离适用于只能在曼哈顿的街道等矩形网格上行驶的旅行者。

trans-unit.source: The traditional C++ approach for storing OR-combinations of enum values is to use an int or uint variable. The inconvenience with this approach is that there's no type checking at all; any enum value can be OR'd with any other enum value and passed on to a function that takes an int or uint.
trans-unit.target: 用于存储枚举值的OR组合的传统C ++方法是使用 int 或 uint 变量。这种方法的不便之处在于根本没有类型检查。任何枚举值都可以与任何其他枚举值进行“或”运算，然后传递给采用 int 或 uint 的函数。

trans-unit.source: The traditional approach to supporting high DPI has been one where Qt scaled fonts automatically, and then provided a DPI value that application code could use to scale the rest of the UI.
trans-unit.target: 传统的支持高DPI的方法是Qt自动缩放字体,然后提供一个DPI值,应用程序代码可以用来缩放UI的其他部分。

trans-unit.source: The traditional assumption in Qt Quick is that Y points up in the normalized device coordinate system. There is at least one modern graphics API where this is not the case (Vulkan). This flag can then be used to get a projection that is appropriate for such an API.
trans-unit.target: Qt Quick中的传统假设是Y指向归一化设备坐标系。至少有一个现代图形API不是这样的(Vulkan)。这个标志可以用来获得适合这种API的投影。

trans-unit.source: The trailing slash is removed from the path, if one is present.

trans-unit.source: The transfer function or gamma curve determines how each component in the color space is encoded. These are used because human perception does not operate linearly, and the transfer functions try to ensure that colors will seem evenly spaced to human eyes.
trans-unit.target: 转移函数或伽玛曲线决定了色彩空间中的每个分量是如何编码的。之所以使用这些功能,是因为人类的感知并不是线性运行的,而传递函数试图确保色彩在人眼里看起来是均匀的。

trans-unit.source: The transfer timeout in milliseconds. Used if setTimeout() is called without an argument.
trans-unit.target: 传输超时,单位为毫秒。如果调用setTimeout()时没有参数,则使用。

trans-unit.source: The transform is dirty and needs to be updated.
trans-unit.target: 变形很脏,需要更新。

trans-unit.source: The transform nodes implement a 4x4 matrix which in theory supports full 3D transformations. However, because the renderer optimizes for 2D use-cases rather than 3D use-cases, rendering a scene with full 3D transformations needs to be done with some care.
trans-unit.target: 变换节点实现了一个4x4矩阵,理论上支持全3D变换。然而,由于渲染器是针对 2D 使用情况而非 3D 使用情况进行优化,因此在渲染全 3D 变换的场景时需要小心谨慎。

trans-unit.source: The transformation
trans-unit.target: 改革

trans-unit.source: The transformation is performed quickly, with no smoothing.
trans-unit.target: 转变的速度很快,没有平滑。

trans-unit.source: The transformation matrix is combined with the item's rotation(), scale() and transformations() into a combined transformation that maps the item's coordinate system to its parent.
trans-unit.target: 转换矩阵与项目的旋转（），比例（）和转换（）组合成一个组合的转换，该转换将项目的坐标系映射到其父项。

trans-unit.source: The transformation matrix is combined with the item's rotation(), scale() and transformations() into a combined transformations for the item.
trans-unit.target: 转换矩阵与项目的旋转（），比例（）和转换（）组合为项目的组合转换。

trans-unit.source: The transformation matrix is combined with the item's rotation(), scale() and transformations() into a combined transformation that maps the item's coordinate system to its parent.
trans-unit.target: 转换矩阵与项目的旋转（），比例（）和转换（）组合为一个组合的转换，该转换将项目的坐标系映射到其父项。

trans-unit.source: The transformation matrix is combined with the item's rotation(), scale() and transformations() into a combined transformations for the item.
trans-unit.target: 转换矩阵与项目的旋转（），比例（）和转换（）组合为项目的组合转换。

trans-unit.source: The transformation matrix tranforms the scene into view coordinates. Using the default transformation, provided by the identity matrix, one pixel in the view represents one unit in the scene (e.g., a 10x10 rectangular item is drawn using 10x10 pixels in the view). If a 2x2 scaling matrix is applied, the scene will be drawn in 1:2 (e.g., a 10x10 rectangular item is then drawn using 20x20 pixels in the view).
trans-unit.target: 变换矩阵将场景转化为视图坐标。使用身份矩阵提供的默认变换,视图中的一个像素代表场景中的一个单位(例如,在视图中使用10x10像素绘制一个10x10的矩形项目)。如果应用2x2缩放矩阵,场景将以1:2的比例绘制(例如,一个10x10的矩形项目将以视图中的20x20像素绘制)。

trans-unit.source: The transformation type is the highest enumeration value capturing all of the matrix's transformations. For example, if the matrix both scales and shears, the type would be TxShear, because TxShear has a higher enumeration value than TxScale.
trans-unit.target: 转换类型是捕获所有矩阵转换的最高枚举值。例如，如果矩阵同时缩放和剪切，则类型将为 TxShear ，因为 TxShear 的枚举值比 TxScale 高。

trans-unit.source: The transformations are combined with the item's rotation(), scale() and transform() to map the item's coordinate system to the parent item.
trans-unit.target: 转换与项目的旋转（），比例（）和transform（）相结合，以将项目的坐标系映射到父项目。

trans-unit.source: The transformations are combined with the item's rotation(), scale() and transform() to map the item's coordinate system to the parent item.
trans-unit.target: 转换与项目的旋转（），比例（）和transform（）相结合，以将项目的坐标系映射到父项目。

trans-unit.source: The transformed() function returns a copy of the image that is transformed with the given transformation matrix and transformation mode: Internally, the transformation matrix is adjusted to compensate for unwanted translation, i.e. transformed() returns the smallest image containing all transformed points of the original image. The static trueMatrix() function returns the actual matrix used for transforming the image.
trans-unit.target: transformed()函数返回一个用给定的变换矩阵和变换模式进行变换的图像的副本。在内部,变换矩阵会被调整以补偿不需要的转换,也就是说,transformed()返回包含原始图像所有转换点的最小图像。静态trueMatrix()函数返回用于变换图像的实际矩阵。

trans-unit.source: The transition can use the ViewTransition property to access more details about the item that is being added. See the ViewTransition documentation for more details and examples on using these transitions.
trans-unit.target: 过渡可以使用ViewTransition属性访问有关所添加项目的更多详细信息。有关使用这些过渡的更多详细信息和示例，请参见ViewTransition文档。

trans-unit.source: The transition can use the ViewTransition property to access more details about the item that is being moved. Note, however, that for this move transition, the ViewTransition.targetIndexes and ViewTransition.targetItems lists are only set when this transition is triggered by the addition of other items in the positioner; in other cases, these lists will be empty. See the ViewTransition documentation for more details and examples on using these transitions.
trans-unit.target: 过渡可以使用ViewTransition属性访问有关正在移动的项目的更多详细信息。但是请注意，对于此移动过渡，仅当通过在定位器中添加其他项目触发此过渡时，才设置ViewTransition .targetIndexes和ViewTransition .targetItems列表。在其他情况下，这些列表将为空。有关使用这些过渡的更多详细信息和示例，请参见ViewTransition文档。

trans-unit.source: The transition used on pop operation. Unless set, the popTransition is the same as pushTransition
trans-unit.target: 在弹出操作上使用的过渡。除非设置，否则popTransition与pushTransition相同

trans-unit.source: The transition used on push operation.

trans-unit.source: The translation system consolidates the user interface text strings into unique items. This consolidation saves the person doing the translation work having to translate the same text multiple times. However, in some cases, the text is identical but has a different meaning. For example, in English, "back" means take a step backward and also means the part of an object opposite to the front. You need to tell the translation system about these two separate meanings so the translator can create two separate translations.
trans-unit.target: 翻译系统将用户界面的文本字符串整合成独特的项目。这种整合使从事翻译工作的人不必多次翻译同一文本。然而,在某些情况下,文本是相同的,但有不同的含义。例如,在英语中,"back "的意思是向后退一步,也指物体与正面相对的部分。你需要把这两个不同的意思告诉翻译系统,这样译员就可以创建两个不同的译文。

trans-unit.source: The transport object implements a minimal message passing interface. It should be an object with a send() function, which takes a stringified JSON message and transmits it to the server-side QWebChannelAbstractTransport object. Furthermore, its onmessage property should be called when a message from the server was received. Alternatively, you can use a WebSocket to implement the interface.
trans-unit.target: 传输对象实现了最少的消息传递接口。它应该是带有 send() 函数的对象，该函数接受字符串化的JSON消息并将其传输到服务器端QWebChannelAbstractTransport对象。此外， onmessage 接收到来自服务器的消息时，应调用其onmessage属性。另外，您可以使用WebSocket来实现该接口。

trans-unit.source: The transport object must be an implementation of QWebChannelAbstractTransport.
trans-unit.target: 传输对象必须是QWebChannelAbstractTransport的实现。

trans-unit.source: The transport object then handles the communication between the C++ application and a remote HTML client.
trans-unit.target: 然后,传输对象处理C++应用程序和远程HTML客户端之间的通信。

trans-unit.source: The two axis steps have been expanded. The first step (//recipe) has been rewritten as /descendant-or-self::element(recipe), where descendant-or-self:: is the axis specifier and element(recipe) is the node test. The second step (title) has been rewritten as /child::element(title), where child:: is the axis specifier and element(title) is the node test. The output of the expanded XQuery will be exactly the same as the output of the shorthand form.
trans-unit.target: 两个轴步已扩展。第一步（ //recipe ）已被重写为 /descendant-or-self::element(recipe) ，其中 descendant-or-self:: 是轴说明符， element(recipe) 是节点测试。第二步（ title ）已被重写为 /child::element(title) ，其中 child:: 是轴说明符， element(title) 是节点测试。扩展的XQuery的输出将与简写形式的输出完全相同。

trans-unit.source: The two common windowing system specific operations are getting a surface (a VkSurfaceKHR handle) for a window, and querying if a given queue family supports presenting to a given surface. To avoid WSI-specific bits in the applications, these are abstracted by QVulkanInstance and the underlying QPA layers.
trans-unit.target: 两种常见的窗口系统特定操作是获取窗口的表面（ VkSurfaceKHR 句柄），并查询给定队列族是否支持向给定表面呈现。为了避免应用程序中WSI特定的位，这些位由QVulkanInstance和基础QPA层抽象。

trans-unit.source: The two most common forms of composition are Source and SourceOver. Source is used to draw opaque objects onto a paint device. In this mode, each pixel in the source replaces the corresponding pixel in the destination. In SourceOver composition mode, the source object is transparent and is drawn on top of the destination.
trans-unit.target: 两种最常见的组合形式是Source和SourceOver。Source用于将不透明的对象绘制到绘制设备上。在此模式下，源中的每个像素替换目标中的相应像素。在SourceOver合成模式下，源对象是透明的，并绘制在目标的顶部。

trans-unit.source: The two most commonly used properties of the MapGestureArea are the enabled and acceptedGestures properties. Both of these must be set before a MapGestureArea will have any effect upon interaction with the Map. The flickDeceleration property controls how quickly the map pan slows after contact is released while panning the map.
trans-unit.target: MapGestureArea的两个最常用的属性是enabled和acceptedGestures属性。必须在MapGestureArea对与Map交互产生任何影响之前进行设置。该flickDeceleration属性控制如何迅速接触后，地图平移减慢，而平移地图被释放。

trans-unit.target: 主窗口侧面的两个垂直停靠区垂直显示其选项卡。如果未设置此选项，则所有停靠区域均在底部显示其选项卡。表示AllowTabbedDocks。另请参见setTabPosition（）。

trans-unit.source: The two-arguments overloads take an unsigned integer that should be used to seed the calculation of the hash function. This seed is provided by QHash in order to prevent a family of algorithmic complexity attacks. If both a one-argument and a two-arguments overload are defined for a key type, the latter is used by QHash (note that you can simply define a two-arguments version, and use a default value for the seed parameter).
trans-unit.target: 包含两个参数的重载采用一个无符号整数，该整数应用于散列哈希函数的计算。QHash提供此种子是为了防止一系列算法复杂性攻击。如果为键类型同时定义了一个参数和两个参数的重载，则QHash将使用后者（请注意，您可以简单地定义一个两个参数的版本，并使用默认值作为seed参数）。

trans-unit.source: The two-arguments overloads take an unsigned integer that should be used to seed the calculation of the hash function. This seed is provided by QHash in order to prevent a family of algorithmic complexity attacks. If both a one-argument and a two-arguments overload are defined for a key type, the latter is used by QHash (note that you can simply define a two-arguments version, and use a default value for the seed parameter).
trans-unit.target: 两个参数的重载采用一个无符号整数，该整数应被用作种子散列函数的计算种子。QHash提供此种子是为了防止一系列算法复杂性攻击。如果为键类型同时定义了一个参数和两个参数的重载，则QHash使用后者的重载（请注意，您可以简单地定义一个两个参数的版本，并使用默认值作为seed参数）。

trans-unit.source: The type of such native handles is highly platform specific and in some cases the platform plugin will need more information to adopt a handle, just the handle in itself will not be sufficient. Therefore the public API consists of functions taking or returning a QVariant that contains a platform-specific value type. See for example QOpenGLContext::setNativeHandle() and QOpenGLContext::nativeHandle(). When running on Linux/X11, using the xcb platform plugin and the GLX windowing system interface, the variant contains a QGLXNativeContext. On other platforms a different class will be used. These classes are all placed in the Qt Platform Headers module.
trans-unit.target: 这种本机句柄的类型是高度特定于平台的，在某些情况下，平台插件将需要更多信息来采用句柄，仅句柄本身是不够的。因此，公共API由采用或返回包含特定于平台的值类型的QVariant的函数组成。例如，请参见QOpenGLContext :: setNativeHandle（）和QOpenGLContext :: nativeHandle（）。在Linux / X11上运行时，使用xcb平台插件和GLX窗口系统接口，该变体包含QGLXNativeContext。在其他平台上，将使用不同的类。这些类都放在Qt Platform Headers模块中。

trans-unit.source: The type of such native handles is highly platform specific and in some cases the platform plugin will need more information to adopt a handle, just the handle in itself will not be sufficient. Therefore the public API consists of functions taking or returning a QVariant that contains a platform-specific value type. See for example QOpenGLContext::setNativeHandle() and QOpenGLContext::nativeHandle(). When running on Linux/X11, using the xcb platform plugin and the GLX windowing system interface, the variant contains a QGLXNativeContext. On other platforms a different class will be used. These classes are all placed in the Qt Platform Headers module.
trans-unit.target: 这种本机句柄的类型是高度特定于平台的，在某些情况下，平台插件将需要更多信息以采用句柄，仅句柄本身是不够的。因此，公共API由采用或返回包含特定于平台的值类型的QVariant的函数组成。例如，请参见QOpenGLContext :: setNativeHandle（）和QOpenGLContext :: nativeHandle（）。在Linux / X11上运行时，使用xcb平台插件和GLX窗口系统接口，该变体包含QGLXNativeContext。在其他平台上，将使用不同的类。这些类都放在Qt Platform Headers模块中。

trans-unit.source: The type of the theme. If no type is set, the type is Theme3D.ThemeUserDefined. Changing the theme type after the item has been constructed will change all other properties of the theme to what the predefined theme specifies. Changing the theme type of the active theme of the graph will also reset all attached series to use the new theme.
trans-unit.target: 主题的类型。如果未设置任何类型，则类型为Theme3D.ThemeUserDefined。构造项目后更改主题类型会将主题的所有其他属性更改为预定义主题指定的属性。更改图形的活动主题的主题类型还将重置所有附加的系列以使用新主题。

trans-unit.source: The types for specifying path elements are shared between PathView and Shape. However, not all Shape implementations support all path element types, while some may not make sense for PathView. Shape's currently supported subset is: PathMove, PathLine, PathQuad, PathCubic, PathArc, and PathSvg.
trans-unit.target: 用于指定路径元素的类型在PathView和Shape 之间共享。但是，并非所有Shape实施都支持所有路径元素类型，而某些实施对于PathView可能没有意义。 Shape当前支持的子集是：PathMove，PathLine，PathQuad，PathCubic，PathArc和PathSvg。
